com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPPivotView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.ViewGroup
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.ViewGroup
          com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPPivotView

public class WPPivotView
extends ViewGroup

This is the simplest of all Pivot components. It draws only one child at a time, giving it the maximum width and height possible. Snapping happens with a given duration and an animation that is used to translate the layout in/ out.

This layout should ONLY be used as part of WPPivotControl.

Since:
03-16-2012

mScroller

snapToTab

public void snapToTab(int tab,
                      int duration,
                      int direction)
Snaps to the supplied tab with a given duration. If duration is negative the default duration is used. Direction is either IN_RIGHT or IN_LEFT and determines whether the tab will animate as it enters visibility.
